brief.brief: This form displays the Tasks that match the selection criteria you entered on the previous screen.
When you select an item on this list, Service Manager places a lock against it. No other user can select this item until you release it by returning to the record list or the Menu.
If another user has a lock against the item you try to select, Service Manager issues a message indicating that it cannot lock the record and giving you the ID of the user who locked the record.
